fsdict::FBDic

fsdict::FBDic< AnnType > Class Template Reference

Class FBDic ("Foward-Backward-Dictionary") covers a dictionary and its reversed variant in one object and also, more importantly, in one binary file on the hard disk. More...

Detailed Description

template<class AnnType = int>
class fsdict::FBDic< AnnType >

Class FBDic ("Foward-Backward-Dictionary") covers a dictionary and its reversed variant in one object and also, more importantly, in one binary file on the hard disk.

Author:
: Uli Reffle
